Key Match Events: B. Varga scored the only goal for Hungary in the 66th minute
K. Duah scored the first goal for Switzerland in the 12th minute
M. Aebischer scored the second goal for Switzerland in the 45th minute
B. Embolo scored the third goal for Switzerland in the 90+3rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Granit Xhaka was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Cologne
Others: Switzerland now has 3 points in Group A, Hungary has 0
